Definition: The input is a tweet. Given such a tweet, output the class the tweet belongs to. The class can be one of the following: Hate Speech, Offensive, or Normal. Hate Speech tweets contain threatening language towards the community targeted. Offensive tweets contain abusive or discriminatory language towards the community targeted.
